com.radiusnetworks.transmission

Class Advertisement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radiusnetworks.transmission.Advertisement

  • public class Advertisement
extends Object
    This class provides APIs to broadcast as a beacon
    Since:
    0.12.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Advertisement.BeaconLayout
      Beacon layout enum

      Builder class for Advertisement.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void startAdvertising(Context context)
      Begins broadcasting beacon advertisement.
      void stopAdvertising()
      Stops advertising as a beacon

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • startAdvertising

        public void startAdvertising(Context context)
        Begins broadcasting beacon advertisement.

        Note only one advertisement can broadcast at a time. Be sure to stop any other advertisements before starting this one.

        Parameters:
        context - Application context in which to start the advertisement. Required for access to the bluetooth interface.

      • stopAdvertising

        public void stopAdvertising()
        Stops advertising as a beacon
